metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21439 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: DoS attack can be performed when an email contains specially designed URLin the body. It can lead to the high CPU usage and cause low quality ofservice, or in extreme case bring the system to a halt. This issue affects:OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions.OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.26 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.13and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
